remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this interface to provide custom envoy information that is carried along with the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.ObjRef> objects.
Classes that implement the current interface hold a serialized chain of message sinks that is regenerated when a proxy is created to represent the object. Such functionality is used for <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context> bound object types only, and represents the groups of objects that provide run-time services such as transactions.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the list of envoys that were contributed by the server context and object chains when the object was marshaled.
